text: Michal Pšenko (born 8 July 1982) is a Slovak skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Slovakia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Poprad
title: Michal Pšenko
